titleStmt.title: An Account of the behaviour of Sir John Fenwick, at his execution on Tower-Hill; with the copy of the paper delivered by him to the sheriffs of London, &c.
titleStmt.author: Fenwick, John, Sir, 1645?-1697.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at London, for John Salusbury at the Rising-Sun in Cornhill, and re-printed at Edinburgh,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, torn, and with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in William Andrews Clark Memorial Library, University of California, Los Angeles.
